casebody.data:
Freddie Lee DIXON, Sr., and Mabel Dixon
v.
Thomas L. HILL, Administrator of the Estate of John Barber, and Palmetto Born Again Church of Christ (Apostolic), Inc., a/k/a Palmetto Deliverance Church. No. 667P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. William L. Davis, III, Lumberton, for Thomas L. Hill. Scott T. Slusser, for Mabel Dixon. R. Clarke Speaks, Wilmington, for Freddie Lee Dixon, Sr.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of December 2005 by Defendant (Palmetto) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."
